projects.title: Node Jwt Authentication
projects.description: This is a project to learn how to implement an authentication system using Node.js, Express, MongoDB & JSON web tokens (JWT). Through this project I have learned to set up an authentication system with login, signup, logout. Also, protect certain routes of pages from unauthenticated users.

projects.title: Bookstore
projects.description: MERN-BookStore is a comprehensive web application built using the MERN stack that allows users to efficiently manage and operate a bookstore. This project incorporates essential CRUD operations to handle books, authors, and other relevant data within the bookstore's inventory.

projects.title: TingDog Website
projects.description: This is my first responsive website made to learn HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

projects.title: My First Portfolio
projects.description: This is my first responsive personal website made to learn HTML and CSS.
